name: Continental Breakfast Buffet
description: Fresh pastries, seasonal fruits, cereals, yogurt, artisanal breads, and premium coffee selection

name: American Breakfast Platter
description: Farm-fresh eggs, crispy bacon, maple sausage, golden hash browns, toast, and fresh orange juice

name: Gourmet Pancake Stack
description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes with pure maple syrup, whipped butter, and seasonal berry compote

name: Eggs Benedict Royale
description: Poached eggs on English muffins with Canadian bacon and hollandaise sauce, served with roasted potatoes

name: Avocado Toast Supreme
description: Multigrain toast topped with smashed avocado, poached egg, cherry tomatoes, and everything seasoning

name: Grilled Atlantic Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon with quinoa pilaf, roasted seasonal vegetables, and lemon butter sauce

name: Mediterranean Chicken Bowl
description: Herb-marinated grilled chicken with quinoa, feta cheese, olives, cucumbers, and tzatziki sauce

name: Wagyu Beef Burger
description: Premium wagyu beef patty with truffle aioli, aged cheddar, arugula, served with truffle fries

name: Thai Green Curry
description: Authentic Thai green curry with coconut milk, bamboo shoots, Thai basil, served with jasmine rice

name: Caesar Salad Deluxe
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with house-made caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, croutons, and grilled chicken

name: Prime Ribeye Steak
description: 28-day aged USDA Prime ribeye with roasted garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables

name: Lobster Thermidor
description: Fresh Maine lobster in creamy thermidor sauce, served with wild rice and asparagus

description: Slow-cooked duck leg with orange glaze, served with roasted root vegetables and wild mushroom risotto

name: Seafood Paella Valenciana
description: Traditional Spanish paella with fresh seafood, saffron rice, mussels, prawns, and clams

name: Vegetarian Tasting Menu
description: Five-course vegetarian tasting menu featuring seasonal vegetables and innovative plant-based preparations

name: Artisanal Cheese Platter
description: Selection of international cheeses with honey, nuts, dried fruits, and artisan crackers

name: Chocolate Fondant Dessert
description: Warm chocolate fondant with molten center, served with vanilla bean ice cream and berry coulis

name: Tapas Selection
description: Assorted Spanish tapas including patatas bravas, chorizo, manchego cheese, and olives
